title: Passada da Novilha
body: A location in the Faial mountain range, where the former silvicultural regent Julio Carlos Etur established a small nursery of indigenous forest essences. The Funchal City Council leased the land designated for the nursery for 6,000 r√©is annually, but it did not yield results, due to the transfer of the aforementioned silvicultural regent to the mainland.
